get.description: Health check endpoint.
List books with filtering and pagination.
Get a single book by ID.

patch.description: Update book status (IN_TRANSIT, ON_HAND, SOLD, REMOVED).
Move book between inventory types (PRIMARY, EXTENDED, FLAGGED).

post.description: Bulk update status for multiple books.

get.description: Check if a title already exists in the collection (duplicate detection).
Full-text search across books and analyses.
Get collection overview statistics.
Get detailed collection metrics including Victorian %, ROI, discount averages.
Get counts by category.
Get counts by publisher with tier info.
Get counts by author.

Get counts by era (Victorian, Romantic, etc.).
Get list of books currently in transit.

Get a single publisher with their books.

delete.description: Delete a publisher. Will fail if publisher has associated books.

get.description: List all authors, optionally filtered by search.
Get a single author with their books.

delete.description: Delete an author. Will fail if author has associated books.

get.description: List all authenticated binding houses.
Get a single binder with their books.

delete.description: Delete a binder. Will fail if binder has associated books.
